name: Dreadworks (Work In Progress)
description:
Still a work in progress. Consider this to be somewhat of a prototype. Once I finish I'll upload the final version. I may upload some newer builds up until that point as well.

Instructions (Later to be added within a tutorial level):

Search for crafting materials in the chests and wardrobes, then craft things at the workbench.

Movement - WASD

Switch Items - 1, 2, 3, 4

Rotate Camera - Q (Rotate Left) and E (Rotate Right)

Interact - Space (interact with chests and wardrobes)

Sneak - Left Shift (sneaking lowers the enemy detection range)

Attack (While machete or pistol is equipped) - Mouse1

Flashlight - F

Reload - R

Heal (While gauze is equipped) - Hold Mouse1

Escape - Pause Menu
